mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE(ID, MEMBER_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: SELECT TBN.ID,TBN.NOTICE_TITLE, TBN.NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(TBN.NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NOTICE_DATE, TBN.NOTICE_COUNT, TBM.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_NOTICE TBN JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBN.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID
